entry.def: Afforestation is the process of planting large numbers of trees on land which has few or no trees on it.

example.ex: Since the Sixties, afforestation has changed the Welsh countryside.
example.tran: 60年代以来，植树造林已经改变了威尔士的乡村面貌。

means.word_mean: 1. the conversion of bare or cultivated land into forest (originally for the purpose of hunting)
